page.title: 16LIFE STYLE
page.content: YOUNG FASHION Now a days there are a lot of different styles.Dressers mostly shop in expensive shops for casual clothes.Scooter boys ride Vespas and usually go on rallys and go scrambling down on the tracks or woods.Casuals buy comfortable but inexpensive clothes. COSMETICS Punks wear outrageous clothes,heavy make_up,chains,studs and lots of earrings.Their hair is multi-coloured and spiked-up.On their feet they wear heavy boots.Greasers ride massive motorcycles. They wear denim clothes and leather jackets.Greasers hate scooter boys.Hippies have long hair,flaired jeans,flower-patterned clothing,beads and go to Heavy Metal concerts to do head-banging.Trendies are very fashion-conscious and always buy the recent style.
